name: Salomon OUTward Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Women's
description: Let the kilometres fly by in burly, lightweight waterproof hiking boots. The durable uppers are synthetic and Nubuck to balance abrasion-resistance and weight, and the midsoles absorbs shock so your feet stay comfortable. Salomon's Advanced Chassis™ system and grippy soles work together to keep your feet stable on rugged trails and loose terrain.Nubuck leather and anti-debris mesh upper provides a durable, glove-like fit.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® bootie lets you tackle wet conditions.Protective synthetic toecap adds toe protection.Gusseted tongue keeps debris out.Removable EVA footbed cushions feet for long days on the trail.Injected EVA midsole combines cushioning and support.Advanced Chassis system stabilizes your foot and protects against push-through.Non-marking Contagrip® MD rubber outsole is durable for long-term wear.
